content: ECAI2020 will have a special focus on AI Starting Researchers, who can participate in several specific events included in the “Mentoring and Communication for Starting Researchers” program: 9th Starting AI Researcher Symposium (STAIRS), Doctoral Consortium, Three Minutes Thesis Competitions, The lunch with an EurAI Fellow, the Job Fair, ... +info: http://ecai2020.eu/call-for-papers/aiearlyresearchers/
sender_full_name: Alberto Bugarín (CiTIUS - University of Santiago de Compostela, ES)
